30 = 3 x 10 three deccans vs
28 = 3 x 9 + 1 pseudo decimal system of the Ennead
28 = 4 x 7 weeks of seven days:

ğ“Š ğ“Šª ğ“‡¹ | one seventh (of a cubit) | 1/7 sept Ï£â²Ÿâ²¡ Ï£â²±â²¡ 1/7=4/28 4-finger breadth "palm"

The Greek alphabet and number system is almost related to the first rod except for the extra entry ğ“¹ğ“Œ´ğ“ˆ–ğ“ğ“†‘ between 90 and 100. This is a general problem: we have 27 numbers but 28 days! The second rod is from a side branch in the development of the alphabet dissimilar to greek. The first sifted letters might be explainable, the ğ“… ğ“…® part much less so.

There is no clear connection to
3 * 9 = 27 Zodiacs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nakshatra

Halaham

The 28 cubit on old Egyptian measuring rods were previously assumed to represent or connect to some form of ancient Alphabet.

It is weakly compatible with the ğ“€  ğ“² ğ“‡“ ğ“ˆ– Harashamun form of the Halaham :
